verses.text: \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eighteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, Abia \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Juda.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w motherâ€™s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Michaia, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Uriel|strong="H0222"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Gabaa: \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* Abia \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w when|strong="H0376"\w* Abia \w had|strong="H0376"\w* begun \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w had|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* chosen \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w put|strong="H0631"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w array|strong="H4421"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* chosen \w and|strong="H3967"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w for|strong="H2428"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* Abia \w stood|strong="H6965"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Semeron, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

Do \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nabat, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* vain \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Belial: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w prevailed|strong="H2388"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Roboam \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Roboam \w was|strong="H1961"\w* unexperienced, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* fearful \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w could|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w resist|strong="H2388"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w able|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w withstand|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* possesseth \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w cast|strong="H5080"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: whosoever cometh \w and|strong="H1121"\w* consecrateth \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bullock \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, whom \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* order.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* holocausts \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w*, \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* made \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ordinance \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* law, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w leaves|strong="H5800"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* set forth \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* most \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* candlestick, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w* thereof, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* lighted always \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* precepts \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, whom \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* forsaken.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leader|strong="H7218"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* army, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sound|strong="H7321"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* resound \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* good \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* spoke these \w things|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w caused|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ambushment \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w stood|strong="H0935"\w* \w facing|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* enemies, \w he|strong="H0310"\w* encompassed Juda. \w who|strong="H3063"\w* perceived \w it|strong="H5437"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w*, \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* army.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3068"\w* Juda \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w coming|strong="H2009"\w* upon \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w both|strong="H4421"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w behind|strong="H0268"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* began \w to|strong="H3068"\w* sound \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Abia \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H5221"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4347"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w wounded|strong="H5221"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* valiant \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* Abia, \w being|strong="H1121"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* kingdom, \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w begot|strong="H3205"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sixteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.
